identity.philosophy: Corporate Minimalist with a Swiss Design Soul. Function over decoration, but execution must be flawless.
identity.mission: Transform a boring corporate survey into a precise, frictionless executive experience.

usage_rules.gradients: FORBIDDEN. Use flat, solid colors only.
usage_rules.text_contrast: Body text must be slate-600 or darker. Headings must be slate-900.
usage_rules.interactive: Buttons must have a hover state that is 10% lighter/darker, not just opacity change.

survey_page.animation: Fade in up for the card. Staggered reveal for form fields.

admin_dashboard.structure: Fixed Left Sidebar (Dark: Slate-900) -> Main Content Area (Light: Slate-50).

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 h-11 px-8 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 h-11 px-8 font-medium

inputs.default: h-11 bg-white border-slate-200 focus:border-slate-900 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-slate-900 transition-colors
inputs.label: text-sm font-semibold text-slate-700 mb-2 block

cards.wrapper: bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-sm p-6 md:p-8 rounded-xl

data_table.header: bg-slate-50 text-slate-500 text-xs uppercase font-bold tracking-wider py-3 px-4

cascading_dropdowns.instruction: Do not just stack them. Use a horizontal grid on desktop (grid-cols-3) if space permits, or a clean vertical stack with a 'connecting line' visual guide on the left to show flow.
cascading_dropdowns.empty_state: When a dropdown is disabled, give it a bg-slate-50 and text-slate-400 style to indicate 'waiting'.

logos.placeholder_company: Use text 'ITC SURVEY' in Manrope Extrabold if logo is missing.

transitions.stagger: variants={{ hidden: { opacity: 0, y: 10 }, visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0 } }}

motion.rules: No motion for motion's sake. Only animate: 1. Entrance of the page. 2. Dropdown opening. 3. Success state checkmark.

accessibility.interactive: All interactive elements must have a visible focus ring (ring-2 ring-slate-900 ring-offset-2).
accessibility.testing: All inputs and buttons must have data-testid attributes (e.g., data-testid='submit-survey-btn').

tech_stack_rules.state: React Hook Form + Zod for validation

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Ensure Manrope and Inter fonts are imported in index.css.
2. THEME: Use the 'Swiss Corporate' style defined above. Strict whitespace, sharp typography.
3. CASCADING LOGIC: The dropdowns (Branch -> Section -> Customer) are the core UX. Make them feel instant. Show a loading spinner inside the Select trigger when fetching data.
4. ADMIN: The dashboard must be dense but legible. Use the full width. The 'Relationship Issue' conditional input in the survey must appear smoothly with an animation.
5. FILE EXTENSIONS: Use .js and .jsx. Do NOT use .ts or .tsx.
6. TESTING: Add data-testid to every single interactive element.
7. IMAGE: Use the 'login_hero' URL for the Admin Login page background (with a dark overlay).
